data.text: @CalStateLA @r_valejandra @CunninghamC16 @shelbygrad @racheluranga @PBI @calfund This is great. i am a nerd and wonder where I can find the study. I want to look at the responses and the methodology. :-)
@CalStateLA @r_valejandra @shelbygrad @racheluranga @PBI @calfund Thank you! The results of this survey have opened my eyes
@r_valejandra @CunninghamC16 @shelbygrad @racheluranga @PBI Hi! Here is a link to the results from the survey from @PBI at #CalStateLA and @calfund: https://t.co/eqJ1KMwGZm

@CunninghamC16 @shelbygrad @racheluranga Hi there, we received an advanced copy of the survey from @PBI and it looks like it's not yet posted live, which is why we can't link yet. Keep a look out here: https://t.co/VboLkqNKOw

To clarify, the survey is of 1,500 Latinos, all in the county. Thanks for reading!

@shelbygrad @racheluranga @r_valejandra Where is the source of this data? I cannot find this screenshot in the article nor a link to the poll. It's also not made clear in the article whether the 1,500 respondents are all Latino, or just a subset of the polled county residents are. Are we just supposed to infer that?
@shelbygrad @r_valejandra voter suppression huh?  ya, its not an issue everyone can get an ID
@shelbygrad @r_valejandra Stop Putin, Stop War, Peace & Freedom For Ukraine 🇺🇦 💔🇺🇦💔🇺🇦💔🩸🇺🇦🩸🇺🇦 https://t.co/8V3bZoBTt2
